rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
早期大流行导致儿童尿路感染诊断下降，严重程度不变JAMA Network Open 的一项队列研究发现，在 COVID-19 大流行早期，儿童尿路感染 (UTI) 诊断有所减少，但疾病严重程度并未增加，这表明过度诊断或误诊可能会减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Early-pandemic-sees-drop-in-child-UTI-diagnoses-severity-unchanged.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Early-pandemic-sees-drop-in-child-UTI-diagnoses-severity-unchanged.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15cfae26-758e-424a-a5b2-9b72707d88ba Thu, 04 Jan 2024 21:24:00 -0500 Early pandemic sees drop in child UTI diagnoses, severity unchanged
英国新冠疫情封锁后淋病病例激增 64%，突显了性传播感染的意外抑制一项对英国泌尿生殖医学诊所活动数据集数据进行分析的研究显示，在放宽 COVID-19 限制后，尽管性传播感染检测仅增加了 5.6%，但淋病诊断增加了 64%，这表明社交距离可能抑制了性传播感染的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Gonorria-cases-surge-6425-post-COVID-lockdown-in-England-highlighting-unintended-STI-suppression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Gonorria-cases-surge-6425-post-COVID-lockdown-in-England-highlighting-unintended-STI-suppression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0abf405a-9601-4d21-846d-be2a47cbb45c Thu, 04 Jan 2024 21:07:00 -0500 Gonorrhea cases surge 64% post-COVID lockdown in England, highlighting unintended STI suppression
HPV 感染与甲状腺癌风险加倍有关台湾一项涉及 3,062 名甲状腺癌患者和 9,186 名对照者的研究发现，HPV 感染使患甲状腺癌的风险增加一倍以上，为这种常见内分泌癌的致癌物质提供了第一个证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/HPV-infection-linked-to-doubled-risk-of-tropical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/HPV-infection-linked-to-doubled-risk-of-tropical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee307e3c-ed67-4787-80dc-6a6d8aec0d22 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 20:51:00 -0500 HPV infection linked to doubled risk of thyroid cancer
芝麻油预防大鼠绝经后骨质疏松症研究表明，在大鼠模型中每天补充芝麻油可以通过维持血清雌激素和芳香酶水平有效预防绝经后骨质疏松症，这表明它有可能作为激素替代疗法的更安全替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Prevention-of-post-menopausal-osteoporosis-in-rats-by-sesame-oil.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Prevention-of-post-menopausal-osteoporosis-in-rats-by-sesame-oil.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e51f4cd5-6a5f-4176-8034-42df545e7b2e Thu, 04 Jan 2024 19:20:00 -0500 Prevention of post-menopausal osteoporosis in rats by sesame oil
计算机化认知训练有望增强痴呆症患者的记忆力研究系统地回顾和荟萃分析了计算机认知训练 (CCT) 对轻度认知障碍或痴呆患者记忆功能的影响，强调了监督和非监督 CCT 的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Computerized-cognitive-training-shows-promise-in-enhancing-memory-for-dementia-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Computerized-cognitive-training-shows-promise-in-enhancing-memory-for-dementia-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75f97a70-95c3-49bf-9039-2d9917008f5a Thu, 04 Jan 2024 19:09:00 -0500 Computerized cognitive training shows promise in enhancing memory for dementia patients
革命性的基于 RNA 的开关为哺乳动物细胞中的基因表达提供了新的控制研究人员开发了一种基于RNA的开关，即pA调节系统，通过调节合成的polyA信号裂解来控制哺乳动物细胞中的基因表达，为基因治疗应用提供了一种新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Revolutionary-RNA-based-switch-offers-new-control-over-gene-expression-in-mammalian-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Revolutionary-RNA-based-switch-offers-new-control-over-gene-express-in-mammalian-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52c26de9-1e11-46a8-9951-45805e753d79 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 18:57:00 -0500 Revolutionary RNA-based switch offers new control over gene expression in mammalian cells
AI 模型利用基因组数据预测 SARS-CoV-2 变种的未来传播研究人员开发了一种基于人工智能的模型来预测新的 SARS-CoV-2 变体的传播，分析了 30 个国家的 900 万个基因组序列，并纳入了疫苗接种率和非药物干预措施等因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/AI-model-predicts-future-spread-of-SARS-CoV-2-variants-using-genomic-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/AI-model-predicts-future-spread-of-SARS-CoV-2-variants-using-genomic-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86a6da74-25d0-4932-94c0-3a82d4bcdac9 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 18:47:00 -0500 AI model predicts future spread of SARS-CoV-2 variants using genomic data
研究发现，孕前母亲的压力与较高的血糖水平有关众所周知，怀孕期间的压力会影响健康结果，但麻省总医院布里格姆分校研究人员的一项新研究表明，评估怀孕前的压力水平也很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Maternal-stress-during-preconception-linked-with-higher-blood-glucose-levels-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Maternal-stress-during-preconception-linked-with-higher-blood-glucose-levels-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0683fb02-9006-45ce-b268-0d5f41720b89 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 14:52:53 -0500 Maternal stress during preconception associated with higher blood glucose levels, study finds
城市绿色和蓝色空间与改善老年人的身心健康有关华盛顿州立大学的一项研究表明，即使城市绿色和蓝色空间的可用性存在微小差异，也可能与老年人更好的心理和身体健康有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Urban-green-and-blue-spaces-linked-to-improved-mental-physical-health-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Urban-green-and-blue-spaces-linked-to-improved-mental-physical-health-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc08b2cf-6b07-4d86-b913-00bc80e11917 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 14:43:54 -0500 Urban green and blue spaces linked to improved mental, physical health in older adults
研究发现 Paxlovid 并不能降低接种疫苗的个体长期感染新冠病毒的风险加州大学旧金山分校的一组研究人员发现，Paxlovid（Nirmatrelvir-ritonavir）并不能降低接种疫苗的非住院个体在首次感染 COVID-19 期间发展为长期 COVID 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Paxlovid-does-not-reduce-long-COVID-risk-in-vaccinated-individuals-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Paxlovid-does-not-reduce-long-COVID-risk-in-vaccinated-individuals-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9652603-7d8f-4253-b1b6-eb272dfba633 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 14:29:18 -0500 Paxlovid does not reduce long COVID risk in vaccinated individuals, study finds
